infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos of your camping trips, gear, and outdoor adventures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select and share photos of your camping experiences.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show you nearby campgrounds, hiking trails, and points of interest.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app may access your calendar through third-party libraries to enhance your camping trip planning experience.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app may access your contacts through third-party libraries to help you share camping trips with friends and family.
